title: Air India receives first factory-fresh 787-9; expects A350-1000 deliveries this year
description: Air India has taken delivery of its first factory-fresh Boeing 787-9, as it looks to receive more widebodies – including its first Airbus A350-1000 – through the rest of the year.

title: Air India receives first line-fit 787; expects A350-1000 deliveries this year
description: Air India has taken delivery of its first line-fit Boeing 787-9, as it looks to receive more widebodies – including its first Airbus A350-1000 – through the rest of the year.

title: Koepka returns to PGA under harsh penalty
description: HONOLULU -- Brooks Koepka is returning to the PGA Tour just five weeks after bolting from LIV Golf, agreeing to a one-time program for elite players that comes with a financial penalty that could rank among the largest in sports.

title: GP matrics urged to use online system to access results
description: The Gauteng Provincial Government makes it easier for matriculants to access their 2025 examination results through the results online system.

title: Rosenior May Not Last Long At Chelsea – Campbell Predicts
description: Former Arsenal and England defender, Sol Campbell, has expressed doubts over how long Liam Rosenior will remain as Chelsea’s head coach, despite praising his appointment and early impact at the club. Rosenior was recently named Chelsea manager following the departure of Enzo Maresca, a decision that has sparked mixed reactions among football pundits and fans.
